text: The only constant in life is change.
author: Heraclitus

text: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I was wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

text: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

text: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

text: Intuition is a very powerful thing, more powerful than intellect.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
author: Steve Jobs
